title: Compare x and y to not x and not y - desc behavior

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the relationship between values produced by Expression A and Expression B?

choices.label: Expression A and Expression B evaluate to different values for all values of  x  and  y.
Expression A and Expression B evaluate to the same value for all values of  x  and  y.
Expression A and Expression B evaluate to the same value only when  x  and  y  have the same value.
Expression A and Expression B evaluate to the same value only when  x  and  y  have different values.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
